channel.title: The smoking dilemma
channel.description:
A series about the complexities of the smoking problem, hosted by Dr. Ralph Grawunder, San Diego State University.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Advertising and Smoking
item.description: Advertising and Smoking. Emerson Foote, member, Surgeon General's Task Force on Smoking and Health.
item.dc:creator: Grawunder, Ralph, 1929-
item.dc:subject: United States--Politics and government--20th century

item.title: How to Stop Smoking
item.description: A conversation with Dr. Irving Baran, a psychiatrist who helps individuals go through the process of quitting smoking at a San Diego County cessation clinic.
item.dc:creator: Grawunder, Ralph, 1929-
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Types of Smokers
item.description: Types of Smokers. Charles Althafer, project coordinator, Smoking Research/San Diego.
item.dc:creator: Grawunder, Ralph, 1929-
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: Smoking and Physical Health
item.description: Smoking and Physical Health. John Chambers, M.D., thoracic and cardiovascular surgeon.
item.dc:creator: Grawunder, Ralph, 1929-
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Government and the Smoking Problem
item.description: Government and the Smoking Problem. Hon. Bob Wilson, Member of U.S. House of Representatives, 36th Congressional District of California
item.dc:creator: Grawunder, Ralph, 1929-
item.dc:subject: United States--Politics and government--20th century

item.title: Development of the Smoking Habit
item.description: Development of the Smoking Habit. Richard Carney, Ph.D., California Western U., president, San Diego County Psychological Association.
item.dc:creator: Grawunder, Ralph, 1929-
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: The Campaigns
item.description: Charles Althafer, the project director for Smoking Research San Diego, discussed national campaigns to discourage smoking.
item.dc:creator: Grawunder, Ralph, 1929-
item.dc:subject: United States--Politics and government--20th century

item.title: The Surgeon General's Report
item.description: The Surgeon General's Report. Arnold Flick, M.D., County University Hospital, San Diego, and contributor of 1964 Surgeon General's Report.
item.dc:creator: Grawunder, Ralph, 1929-
item.dc:subject: United States--Politics and government--20th century
